abstract: In winning Dow Jones, Rupert Murdoch has taken over the paper he has long dreamed of owning, The Wall Street Journal. But the mogul dropped word earlier this week that he had considered bidding for another storied newspaper: DealBook’s parent, The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: In winning Dow Jones, Rupert Murdoch has taken over the paper he has long dreamed of owning, The Wall Street Journal. But the mogul dropped word earlier this week that he had considered bidding for another storied newspaper: DealBook’s parent, The New York Times.

headline.main: Did Murdoch Mull a Times Offer?
